text: Yaqoob (alh-e-salam) ney kaha! Mein to issay hergiz hergiz tumharay sath nahi bhejon ga jabtak tum Allah ko beech mein rakh ker mujhay qol-o-qarar na do kay tum issay meray pass phoncha do gay siwaye uss aik soorat kay tum sab giriftaar ker liye jao. Jab enhon ney pakka qol-o-qarar dey diya to enhon ney kaha kay hum jo kuch kehtay hain Allah uss per nigehban hai
